thread.title: Seth Meyers Rips Trump For Ridiculous Mar-A-Lago Weekend
thread.title_full: Seth Meyers Rips Trump For Ridiculous Mar-A-Lago Weekend

author: Rebecca Shapiro
title: Seth Meyers Rips Trump For Ridiculous Mar-A-Lago Weekend
text:
Seth Meyers Rips Trump For Ridiculous Mar-A-Lago Weekend 'Even in a crisis, Trump knows where the camera is. Look at him!' 02/14/2017 02:52 am ET Rebecca Shapiro Senior Editor, The Huffington Post 
Seth Meyers could not get enough of news reports detailing how President Donald Trump spent Saturday evening at his private club, Mar-a-Lago. 
Photos posted to social media appeared to show Trump dining on the club’s patio while reviewing intelligence reports on a North Korean missile launch with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe . 
The “Late Night” host pointed out how Trump didn't let a breaking national security incident ruin his night -- from smiling at a camera while seemingly reviewing sensitive materials in an unsecured location, to crashing a nearby wedding and giving a speech. 
Check out the full takedown in the video above. Also on HuffPost
